QuestData.Title: Acquisition: Runeforged Shackles
QuestData.Description:
<The chains here are carved with domination runes, imbuing them with the magic needed to subdue the most powerful of the Mawsworn's prisoners.
No doubt Ve'nari could find some use in studying these runes.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Runeforged Shackles and return them to Ve'nari in the Maw.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Chains? Not exactly hard to find around here... wait, those runes...
You have a keen eye, indeed. The magic here is worth further study.
